newsitem.title: GERMANY: Lufthansa Cargo April load factor 67.2pct.
newsitem.headline: Lufthansa Cargo April load factor 67.2pct.

text.p: Lufthansa Cargo saw a 0.5 percent decline in its freight load factor to 67.2 percent in April ovre the same month last year, Deutsche Lufthansa AG said.
The cargo airline improved cargo/mail tonnage 1.3 percent to 141,100 tonnes but April revenue growth was lower than capacity growth, it added.
The Lufthansa Cargo cargo load factor over the first four months of the year was down one percentage point to 68 percent on the same 1996 period.
The following table shows Lufthansa Cargo 1997 traffic figures with the percentage change on April 1996.
